With this function you can get the full abgr 32bit value of any pixel of a (previously created) surface.
NOTE: This function will have a huge performance hit and so should only be used when absolutely necessary.
The ID of the surface to use.
The x coordinate of the pixel to check
The y coordinate of the pixel to check

{ANY_CODE} col = surface_getpixel_ext(mouse_x, mouse_y);
alpha = (col >> 24) & 255;
blue = (col >> 16) & 255;
green = (col >> 8) & 255;
red = col & 255;
The above code will get the 32bit colour value at the position of the mouse and then split it into its component values, storing them in variables.
